io.micronaut.http

Interface MutableHttpHeaders

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConvertibleMultiValues<String>, ConvertibleValues<List<String>>, HttpHeaders, Iterable<Map.Entry<String,List<String>>>, ValueResolver<CharSequence>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyHttpHeaders

    public interface MutableHttpHeaders
extends HttpHeaders
    Extends HttpHeaders add methods for mutation of headers.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
